title: Alex Gerrard showcases her shapely limbs as she heads out in Liverpool
title_page: Alex Gerrard showcases her shapely limbs as she heads out in LiverpoolÂ  | Daily Mail Online
text:
She splits her time between the sunny climes of Los Angeles and her home city of Liverpool.
And Alex Gerrard, 33, was on the Mersey beat on Friday as she hit her gym and went for a jog around the Allerton suburb with a pal.
The model, who's married to Ex-Liverpool Football Club captain Steven, walked the short distance from her car to the gym in her sports gear and had a big smile on her face.
Scroll down for video
Work it out: Alex Gerrard, 33, was on the Mersey beat on Friday as she hit her gym and went for a jog around the Allerton suburb with a pal
Keeping things co-ordinated, the fitness fanatic dressed in a black and white striped vest top worn underneath a thin black hoody and a striped snood.
She matched it with a pair of black leggings which showcased her toned limbs and completed the ensemble with a pair of comfy running shoes.
As she walked she hung her black leather handbag over her right arm while clutching her phone.
Bling! Even on the move, clues of Alex's extravagant lifestyle could be seen with her huge rock glistening on her finger
Fitness fanatic: The model, who's married to Ex-Liverpool Football Club captain Steven, walked the short distance from her car to the gym in her sports gear and had a big smile on her face
Typically glam: Keeping things co-ordinated, the fitness fanatic dressed in a black and white striped vest top worn underneath a thin black hoody and a striped snood
Having perfected the art of looking good while working up a sweat, Alex wore her hair pulled back in a ponytail and applied minimal make-up.
Once she'd ditched her belongings, she took off her hoody and set off on her jog at a brisk pace.
Her ponytail bobbed as he moved with a light step. Even on the move, clues of Alex's extravagant lifestyle could be seen with her huge rock glistening on her finger.
Run like the wind: Once she'd ditched her belongings, she took off her hoody and set off on her jog at a brisk pace
Committed: The WAG was spotted working on her physique in LA last weekend as she hit a SoulCycle class with a pal
The mother-of-three was recently pictured in LA hitting a SoulCycle class, before meeting her hubby for a romantic lunch.
The model looked typically svelte as she sauntered to the gym in a thin leopard-print coat, monochrome training top, Adidas leggings and matching black trainers.
It was clearly an intense session with Alex's cheeks appearing flushed as she re-emerged from the gym.
Her friend had also tied her jumper around her waist suggesting the pair worked up quite a sweat on the bikes.
